reviews.review_msg: I was struggling alot in the beginning but he and the TAs were rlly helpful during office hours to help guide me and answer my questions. it was tough but the hardwork payed off after getting back our midterm marks. i think as long as you go to office hours, take detailed notes, and do all the HW, you'll do well.
funny like my dad but I failed my midterm

Excellent teacher. He has obviously been teaching investments for a long time, because he knows what areas people tend to struggle with, and spends more time on those areas. I would choose to take another class with him again even if I didn't plan on taking that course because I think Emrul, no matter the course, will teach me something valuable.

Get ready for Emrul because he will kill you, but what doesn't kill you will make you stronger. BUS 315 was probably the most overwhelming class I have taken. He is a wonderful professor, he is supportive and explains things well. But, he will overload the *** out of you with the amount of work. This class was like taking two classes in one.

Emrul is one of the best profs I've had at SFU. His lectures are engaging, well thought out and easy to understand despite the content being a bit heavy. He makes sure students understand every topic and is happy to answer any questions students have. Exams are extremely fair and he tells you what to focus on. Enjoyed taking this class with him.
His teaching is ok. Goes in tangent sometimes. Very tough course.
Its a 4 credit course, so get ready to work. But if you are taking the class, do yourself a favour and take the class with Emrul. Theres a lot of work but you will learn along the way.
Amazing prof! Loved the classes. A little more about other alternative investments would be better but I learned a lot. Also found the exams easy.

I never missed his class because he was entertaining and he shows important topics that will be tested in the CFA exam. Also taking the SFU CFA prep class taught by him. Online classes are hard but at least this is the class where I could listen and relax. Highly recommended.

Exams are hard and there were 3 term exams. But he really cares about his students, and gave student options to improve their overall grade by moving some weight to future exams. Lecturers are entertaining too. Learned a lot about CFA which is a plus.
very arrogant professor that spends half of lecture just telling stories about his past. Tests are easy however.

Took Bus 315 with Emrul, he's an amazing prof and is super clear about what will be tested. Exams are over all extremely fair, he tells you during lecture exactly what type of written questions will be on exams. The class does have a lot of deliverables there were weeks we had a quiz, homework and group project all due with the same week.

Loved the lectures and the contents. Exams were hard and had occasional mistakes which can be frustrating. Knowing Emrul from this class, I blame the COVID-related fatigue and online learning environment even though he adapted very well. His teaching is very smooth even online. Highly recommended!

There have been lots of ups and downs in this course that I took with Dr. Hasan. It seems he genuinely cares for his students, but the course load was high for me. Maybe because the course is online. I still learned a lot, and I am looking forward to taking more courses with Dr. Hasan in the future.

Emrul is the best professor I met at SFU. His grading criteria are a bit confusing but he gives an amazing lecture. He boosted my interest in finance. This class is super helpful in passing the CFA level 1 exam that I am taking in August 2020. Take his class and you won't regret it.

Amazing teacher! He listens to students carefully and answers all the questions we ask on chat which hardly happens in my other online courses we are taking due to COVID. He really made the course very interesting and I learned a lot so far. Exams are hard but he gives schemes so that you can improve on later.

Emrul is a gem of a teacher. He adapted to online teaching really well. This is the only class I attended synchronously. He teaches real life finance stuffs those are very important for us. I recommend him for BUS315 if you are planning to write CFA exam in future.

Added entire class to his CFA prep course email list. Attendance and participation through Piazza are a significant part of the grade for some reason. Claims he doesn't use test banks, tries to sound scary and say he will catch cheaters, then proceeds to use test banks for all MCQ Individual + group assignment + a quiz within 2 days next week lol

Emrul tried his best to be hands on & teach us real life application of 315 concepts. He also gave us a lot of advice for our career. Despite being busy, he made himself available for help whenever possible outside lecture. I got below average for midterm and still landed an A with hardwork and his help. His last lec was so inspiring I almost cried

Professor Hasan is the best professor I met during university. Super clear on grading criteria, and gives amazing lecture. Makes you become interest in finance and Econ in his own way. His investment class is super help in passing CFA level 1 exam. Take his class and you won't regret it! Truly inspirational!!

Great professor. Truly inspirational and takes the time to explain everything in class. Inspired me to pursue my CFA. Fair exams. Miles better than someone like Blazenko, which I didn't do too well in but exceled in this class because of Emrul's teaching method. Do not skip class!! He guarantees you'll do well as long as you come to class, true.

Emrul was hands down one of the BEST profs at SFU. I did not do well on the first assignment or the midterm, but he gives ample opportunity for you to do well if you work extra hard for the final. He was also extremely fair. I am so sad that he's being taken away from us by UBC.
Emrul is a great instructor. The exam is fair!

Didn't actually teach the material. Rather he would provide an overview of the material and then expect you to somehow learn it. Exams were not reflective of the course work. Watch out UBC. Glad he won't be at SFU anymore.

He really cares about his students. During office hours, he puts in the time and explains the concepts thoroughly to make sure you really understand. He is a great prof and would definitely have him for my other courses. Make sure you go to every lecture. His exams are fair game and he's a funny, nice guy. Would like more profs like him.
Emrul is a great prof. He is fair about what he puts on the tests and very accessible for help.
Awesome professor but the course is really tough.
Emrul is very knowledgeable and is one of the far better instructors I have had at SFU.
I took the course with Emrul in 2016 and I am very grateful how his course helped me pass my level 1 CFA exam. He goes deep into the concepts and that helped me a lot. God bless

I had Emrul last term for my Bus315 and he is simply fabulous. Never seen a better prof that him. As a finance major, it's very important for me to understand the concepts and Emrul satisfies that. I am highly indebted to him. God bless him :)
Great prof, provides lots of help. Recommend to take his class
Highly recommended. Great teaching ability and makes class worthwhile.

Emrul is a very fair prof. His (315) lectures can be very dense but he does his best to keep them interesting. Attending lectures is not mandatory but highly recommended and makes studying a lot easier. He has passion for the subject, loves teaching and cares about his students. Only had him for 315 but would definitely take more classes with him.

He made lectures very interesting, very very different from the usual lectures i attend. He also teaches with a passion, always giving real life personal experiences that we can understand and relate to.

He is a funny prof that tries to create an interesting & engaging learning environment. To some extent, he did. He clearly stated the scope of exam and followed it as promised. And you do have an option to recover your bad midterm grade by kicking butt to work hard in final. Overall, a informative lecture and friendly prof himself.
Lectures were extremely clear, fun, thoughtful and  well organized.  Overall Emrul presented the material exceptionally well. Best prof I had so far at SFU.

Emrul is absolutely awesome at teaching but sometimes the course matter seems a little bit rushed. This is a rare occurrence but I did find myself hung up a couple of times due to this. I believe Emrul should teach more courses.
I liked that EMRUL is pretty funny and tried to keep things interesting and simple. He was also honest when we were going through slides that were boring. Well recommended.

Now I know why people fight to take this class because Emrul teaches it. The material is hard, and so much time has to be put into it in order to do well in the class, but its worth it. Being able to go to a class with someone who knows and cares about the material so much is a blessing.

Best if you are well-inclined in investments. Is pretty straightforward; likes to bring in real-life examples. Best if you pre-read before class. A good prof for Bus 315 in terms of difficulty, availability, and clarity.
Emrul is a very inspiring prof who cares for students a lot. His real life examples are gems and he is very funny when he talks. Not boring at all. Passionate about Finance. Highly recommended.
